effect.sun_moon: Prevents heal bell from curing the Pokémon, whether or not it is in battle.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Prevents heal bell from curing the Pokémon, whether or not it is in battle.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Prevents heal bell from curing the Pokémon, whether or not it is in battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Soundproofing of the Pokémon itself gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Soundproofing of the Pokémon itself gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
